title: [Question]: DocPrompt 指定模型的路径
body:
### 请提出你的问题

在使用 taskflow 的 intelligence_document 功能时，可以通过 task_path 指定模型的路径
docprompt  = Taskflow('intelligence_document', schema=schema, task_path=......)

但是，DocPrompt 使用时存在两个路径，一个是 taskflow 相关的，一个是模型 ernie-layoutx-base-uncased 相关的。task_path 好像是对 taskflow 路径生效的。请问下，这两个路径可以分别指定吗？

/root/.paddlenlp/taskflow/document_intelligence/docprompt/
/root/.paddlenlp/models/ernie-layoutx-base-uncased/special_tokens_map.json

body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle-gpu: 2.4.1
- paddlenlp: 2.4.1
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
当文本中存在emoji时，使用tokenizer获取offset_mapping会出现list越界问题。报错信息如下。


Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/wangqinghui/mynlp/PaddleNLP/test_taskflow.py", line 28, in <module>
    encoded_inputs = tokenizer(text=text, text_pair=prompt,truncation=True,
  File "/wangqinghui/mynlp/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/transformers/tokenizer_utils_base.py", line 2209, in __call__
    return self.encode(
  File "/wangqinghui/mynlp/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/transformers/tokenizer_utils_base.py", line 2286, in encode
    return self._encode_plus(
  File "/wangqinghui/mynlp/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/transformers/tokenizer_utils.py", line 985, in _encode_plus
    return self.prepare_for_model(
  File "/wangqinghui/mynlp/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/transformers/tokenizer_utils_base.py", line 2768, in prepare_for_model
    token_offset_mapping = self.get_offset_mapping(text)
  File "/wangqinghui/mynlp/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/transformers/tokenizer_utils.py", line 1362, in get_offset_mapping
    return self._get_bert_like_offset_mapping(text)

    token_mapping.append((char_mapping[start], char_mapping[end - 1] + 1))
IndexError: list index out of range
```

### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

from paddlenlp.transformers import AutoTokenizer

tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained("ernie-1.0")
text = "好👌🏻"
prompt = '评价维度'
encoded_inputs = tokenizer(text=text, text_pair=prompt, runcation=True,pad_to_max_seq_len=True, return_attention_mask=True, return_position_ids=True, return_offsets_mapping=True,)

print(encoded_inputs)

title: Deprecate Distutils
body:
### 问题描述

Distutils is marked as deprecated in Python 3.10/3.11 and will be removed in Python 3.12. We still have some trivial Distutils usage in our codebase (mostly distutils.util.strtobool). We should get ahead of this and migrate Distutils to Setuptools whenever it's convenient.

训练/opt/PaddleNLP-develop/model_zoo/uie/checkpoint/model_best模型使用的信息抽取文档中模型微调提前的命令：
export finetuned_model=./checkpoint/model_best

python finetune.py  \
    --device gpu \
    --logging_steps 10 \
    --save_steps 100 \
    --eval_steps 100 \
    --seed 42 \
    --model_name_or_path uie-base \

    --dev_path data/dev.txt  \
    --max_seq_length 512  \
    --per_device_eval_batch_size 16 \

    --do_train \

    --do_export \

    --overwrite_output_dir \
    --disable_tqdm True \
    --metric_for_best_model eval_f1 \
    --load_best_model_at_end  True \
    --save_total_limit 1

请问这个是哪里的问题，缺少啥步骤吗

title: [Docs]:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/docs/advanced_guide/prompt.md
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle:2.4.1.post117
- paddlepaddle-gpu: 2.4.1.post117
- paddlenlp: 2.4.5
```


### 详细描述

```Markdown
文档中前缀连续型模板的第一个样例"{'prefix': '新闻类别', 'length': 10, 'encoder': 'lstm'}{'text': 'text_a'}"中缺少{"mask"},并且下面AutoTemplate.create关于prefix tuning的样例中也没有{"mask"}，原文如下：template = AutoTemplate.create_from(prompt="{'prefix': None, 'encoder': 'mlp', 'hidden_size': 50}{'text': 'text_a'}",
                                    tokenizer=tokenizer,
                                    max_length=512,
                                    model=model)，
还有一个问题，关于prefix_dropout这个参数好像只有单独调用PrefixTemplate才能使用，从AutoTemplate.create_from方法使用prefix tuning时，prefix_dropout这个参数失效了，有可能类的继承里面出现问题，小问题但不影响使用。
```

title: [Question]: Ernie-layout finetuned model with "ResahpOps is invalid" error
body:
### 请提出你的问题

Hi there,
   Im using the ernie-layout model for some VQA tasks atm, and finetune with our custom data, following the steps mentioned
here [https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/tree/develop/model_zoo/ernie-layout](url) So specifically, I did as follows:
1. specify our custom data in `custom_data/`
2. run the `run_mrc.py` to do the finetune, got the trained files ouput in `target_path`
3.  run the `export_model.py` with --model_path as `target_path` and output_path `output_path`, got the inference.pdiparams and inference.pdmodels and inference.info as output in `output_path`
4. tar those inferences file as docpromt.tar file and put it under `.paddlenlp/taskflow/document_inetelligence/doocpromt/static`
5.  copy those inferences files to the `.paddlenlp/taskflow/document_inetelligence/doocpromt/static/`
so the file structure looks like 
```
- docpromt
   - docpromt.tar
   - stastic
      - inference.pdiparams
      - xxxx
      - xxx
```
6. Initailize the docpromot obj and run the inference is 
```
docprompt = Taskflow("document_intelligence", lang="en", task_path=".paddlenlp/taskflow/document_inetelligence/doocpromt/")
docprompt(doc=[""], questions=[xxxx])
```
However, when doing the step 6, I got the following error

InvalidArgumentError: The 'shape' attribute in ReshapeOp is invalid. The input tensor X'size must be divisible by known capacity of 'shape'. But received X's shape = [7 , 7,  4], X's size = 196, 'shape' is [49, 1], known capacity of 'shape' is 49

The same image I use is working prefectly fine with the origin model without finetune, So wondering what is wrong here, thanks a lot for the help :)

### 请提出你的问题

模型网络输入变量的定义 ：def forward(query=None, query_repr=None, title_repr=None, title=None)，
具体使用时是需要：
 1. 在训练时输入query和title输出两者相似度；
 2. 在离线时是输入query输出query向量；   
 3. 在线预测时输入query_repr和title_repr输出两者相似度； 
model = paddle.jit.to_static(
        model,
        input_spec=[
            None,  # query_id
            paddle.static.InputSpec(shape=[None, None], dtype="float32"),  # query_embedding
            paddle.static.InputSpec(shape=[None, None], dtype="float32"),  # title_embedding
        ],
    )

title: [Bug]:  export_model() missing 1 required positional argument: 'input_spec' 的错误
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
paddle-bfloat         0.1.7           
paddle2onnx           1.0.3           
paddlefsl             1.1.0           
paddlenlp             2.4.3           
paddleocr             2.6.1.0         
paddlepaddle-gpu      2.4.0rc0.post112
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述


GPU环境下，按照‘小样本场景下的多标签层次分类任务指南’，
测试给定的events数据，整个训练过程可以跑完，但是在导出步骤，也即执行
```
python train.py --do_export --data_dir ./data --output_dir ./export_checkpoint --resume_from_checkpoint ./checkponts/
```
这个命令时，会出现TypeError: export_model() missing 1 required positional argument: 'input_spec'的错误提示



### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

GPU机器，已满足paddlepaddle及paddleNlp/paddle2onnx的版本要求，按照‘小样本场景下的多标签层次分类任务指南’，见这个链接
https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/tree/develop/applications/text_classification/hierarchical/few-shot#readme

测试给定的events数据，整个训练过程可以跑完，但是在导出模型的步骤，无法通过。也即执行：
```bash
python train.py --do_export --data_dir ./data --output_dir ./export_checkpoint --resume_from_checkpoint ./checkponts/
```
这个命令时，会出现以下错误提示：
```
[2022-12-17 14:27:50,017] [    INFO] - Loading model from ./checkpoints/ .
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 133, in <module>
    main()
  File "train.py", line 129, in main
    trainer.export_model(export_path,  export_type=model_args.export_type)
TypeError: export_model() missing 1 required positional argument: 'input_spec'
```
